name: UnofficialStarWarsInfo
0:
”Alexa, open Unofficial Star Wars Info”
”How tall is Luke Skywalker”
”Who is the producer of a new hope”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial star wars info
des:
Do you love Star Wars?, Of Course you do.

Why not get information about your favorite characters in all SEVEN Star Wars films?


You can ask height, weight, gender of starwars characters
ex: 
What is the height of Luke Skywalker?
What is the weight of Yoda?
What is the gender of Chewbacca?


You can get producer, director, opening crawl, release date of all starwars films
ex: 
What is the opening crawl of Revenge of the Sith?
What is the release date of A new hope?
Who directed Return of the Jedi?
Who is the producer of Attack of the Clones?
When did The Phantom Menace release?

May the force be with you.

NOTE : This skill is UnOfficial and not sponsored or endorsed by Lucasfilm Ltd or Wookieepedia or Star Wars or Disney.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
